publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3029 Dr Winnie Ewing: Russian Convoy Medals-That the Parliament congratulates Russia on its action in awarding medals to British servicemen deployed on convoys to Russia during World War Two but deplores the failure of Her Majesty's Government to give similar recognition to those who performed this highly dangerous service. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*
S1M-3029 Russian Convoy Medals (lodged on 24 April 2002) Michael Matheson*, Stewart Stevenson*, Michael Russell*

S1M-3029 Dr Winnie Ewing: Russian Convoy Medals-That the Parliament congratulates Russia on its action in awarding medals to British servicemen deployed on convoys to Russia during World War Two but deplores the failure of Her Majesty's Government to give similar recognition to those who performed this highly dangerous service. Supported by: Fergus Ewing, Michael Matheson, Stewart Stevenson, Michael Russell
S1M-3029 Russian Convoy Medals (lodged on 24 April 2002) Kay Ullrich*, Andrew Wilson*
S1M-3029 Russian Convoy Medals (lodged on 24 April 2002) Brian Adam*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Christine Grahame*, John Farquhar Munro*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-3029 Russian Convoy Medals (lodged on 24 April 2002) Fiona Hyslop*, Alex Neil*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3029 Russian Convoy Medals (lodged on 24 April 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3029 Russian Convoy Medals (lodged on 24 April 2002) Shona Robison*
S1M-3029 Russian Convoy Medals (lodged on 24 April 2002) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-3029 Russian Convoy Medals (lodged on 24 April 2002) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3029 Russian Convoy Medals (lodged on 24 April 2002) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Tricia Marwick*
S1M-3029 Russian Convoy Medals (lodged on 24 April 2002) Linda Fabiani*
